project_path.KazooCoin: contracts/KazooCoin Full Smart Contract Security Audit/KazooCoin

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long list of excluded addresses.
